Detailed Description

Arduino Pin library group functions.

Author
Alec Fenichel

Arduino library for fast access to Arduino I/O pins using port manipulation with functions for simultaneous operations on multiple Pins

Definition in file PinGroup.h.

Definition at line 19 of file PinGroup.h.

#define MERGE_OFFSET (   PINS,
  LEN 
)
Value:
{ \
offset = (PINS)[0].getOffset(); \
for (int i = 1; i < (LEN); i++) { \
offset |= (PINS)[i].getOffset(); \
} \
}

Merge the offsets of multiple pins in an array.

Function Documentation

template<size_t N>
bool checkPinGroup ( Pin(&)  pins[N])

Check the array to ensure all pins use the same registers.

Parameters
pinsan array of pins
Returns
true if the pins in the array all use the same registers, false otherwise

Definition at line 204 of file PinGroup.h.

template<size_t N>
uint8_t getValue ( Pin(&)  pins[N])

Get the value of multiple pins from the PIN register.

Parameters
pinsan array of pins that use the same registers
Returns
HIGH if all of the pins in the array have a value of HIGH, LOW if all of the pins in the array have a value of LOW, -1 otherwise
